casebody.data:
No. 09-1488. Sally Cornejo, Individually and on Behalf of Her Minor Son, Kevin Salas, Petitioner v. Fredda Monn, et al. 562 U.S. 948, 131 S. Ct. 158,

178 L. Ed. 2d 243,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 7750. October 4, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 592 F.3d 121.
